SA15bsa0556u:7: tatra na tāvat kramaḥ kramāṇāmekaikaṃ prati pūrvāparakālayoḥ karttṛtvākarttṛtvāpatteḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:9: tatra ca sphuṭa taraḥ pūrvvāparakālayoḥ karttṛtvākartṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:10: virudve ca karttṛtvākarttṛtve ekadharmmiṇi na sambhavataḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:11: ekasvabhāvaśca tāvatkālamakṣaṇika iti sidva etasmin kramayaugapadyayorayogaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:12: tadevamakṣaṇike vyāpakānupalabdhyā niṣidvaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika evā[va] tiṣṭhate iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:13: tattena vyāptaṃ yat yatra dharmmiṇi sidhyati tatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhayati /
SA15bsa0556u:20: nahi mahānasasidvāyāmagnidhūmayorvyāptau punaragnisidvaye dhūmaliṅgamanviṣyata iti / tathāhi /
SA15bsa0556u:22: hetumātrasya dṛṣṭasya vyāptiḥ pakṣe tu gamyate //
SA15bsa0556u:25: pratyakṣadṛṣṭayorvanhidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvasidvau tayorvyāptisidviriti pratyakṣasidve vanhau yuktamanumānavaiphalyam /
SA15bsa0556u:26: naivaṃ vyāptisidveḥ prāk pramāṇāntarasidvaṃ dharmmiṇi kṣaṇikatvam /
SA15bsa0556u:27: sādhanadharmmameva tu kevalamanupaśyanto viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇavalāttasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ pratīmaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:30: kṣaṇikatvavyāptasya sattvasya tathātvena dharmmiṇi pratītau kṣaṇikatvasyāpi pratīteriti cet /
SA15bsa0556u:37: evamihāpi yat sattatkṣaṇikamiti vyāptipratītau sādhanadharmmasyāpi dharmmiṇi sattvaṃ nāntarbhavati /
SA15bsa0556u:39: tasmāt sattvasāmānyasya sādhanadharmmasya pakṣadharmmatvaṃ vyāptiścaikaśaḥ pratipādya tadubhayasāmarthyāt sādhyadharmmasya dharmmiṇi vṛttiḥ pratīyata iti kuto 'numānavaiphalyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:40: yadyevaṃ vyāptipratītāvasati dharmmiṇi parāmarśe sādhyadharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇamiti /
SA15bsa0556u:45: nanu vyāptipakṣadharmmatvayorekaśaḥ pratītāvapi yasyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagatantasyaiva sādhyena vyāptiravasiteti sāmarthyāt sādhyasattākathanamavaiyarthyaṃ sādhanasya /
SA15bsa0556u:49: anyathā viśeṣayorvyāptiprasaṅgāt tadayaṃ vyastaviṣayaḥ sāmarthyāditi hetunirddeśaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:54: api ca gṛhīte pakṣadharmmatve sambandhe ca smṛte anumānaṃ bhavadbhiriṣyate /
SA15bsa0556u:56: na hi bahirvyāptivādināmapi vismṛtāyāṃ vyāptau anumānapravṛttirasti /
SA15bsa0556u:57: tatra yasyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagataṃ tasyaiva sādhyadharmmeṇa vyāptismṛteḥ kinna sarvvānumānavaiyarthyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:64: ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇānnāsādhāraṇateti cet tathāpi kinna sādhyadharmmī parāmṛśyate /
SA15bsa0556u:65_0: yatra yatra parvvate dhūmastatra tatrāgniryathā mahānasa iti sāmānyālambanāyāṃ vyāptau
SA15bsa0556u:67: tamantareṇāpi vyāpteḥ sāmānyālambanāyāḥ paricchedaparisamāpteḥ kathamanyathā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇavārttāpi tadedānīṃ pakṣadharmmatvāyogāt pakṣadharmmatvāgrahaṇāt;
SA15bsa0556u:68: pakṣadharmmatvagrahaṇe vā tadaiva sādhyamapi sāmarthyādasidvaṃ sidvamiti sarvvānumānavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:69: paścātkālabhāviliṅgajñānamapi ca smṛtireva syāt na pramāṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:70: tasmāt vyāpteranaṅgatvāt pakṣadharmmatvaṃ vyāptigrahaṇe sadapi nāntarbhavatīti pṛthaggṛhītasmṛtayoḥ pakṣadharmmatvavyāptyoḥ sāmarthyādanumeyagatirutpadyate iti /
SA15bsa0556u:75: na tu trairupyapratīterantarbhāva iti sarvvaṃ samānaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:77: antarvyāptau hi vyāptiṃ prati gatyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagataṃ anavagate pakṣadharmmatve vyāpterapyanavagateḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:82: pratyakṣa iva dṛṣṭānte tatra setyanyathā kathaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:83: dvau dṛṣṭvā vidma iti ced vyāpteḥ prāk dvayadṛk kathaṃ //"
SA15bsa0556u:84: vyāptipakṣadharmmatve hi svavākyābhyāṃ yena tena prayuktābhyāṃ sūcyete na tu sākṣāt pratīyete /
SA15bsa0556u:87: sūcitayo 'stu tayoḥ sattve hetau prathamatarapakṣadharmmatvaviṣayameva pramāṇamabhimukhībhavatu /
SA15bsa0556u:88: tena pramāṇena dharmmiṇi sidvasya sattvasya paścādvyāptiḥ pramāṇāntareṇa gṛhyata iti kasya vaiyarthyamiti /
SA15bsa0556u:89: pratyakṣe 'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi prathamaṃ heturgṛhyate paścādvyāptirityeṣa eva kramaḥ anyathā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vyāptirgṛhītetyetadeva na syāt /
SA15bsa0556u:91: yadyevaṃ sādhyadharmmo 'pi vyāptigrahaṇādhikaraṇe dharmmiṇi grahītabya eva yathā vanhidhūmayoriti cet /
SA15bsa0556u:94: jñātaścaivaṃ na khalu vyāptigrahaṇāt prāk kṣaṇikasya kvacidapi sidvirasti tasyānumeyatvāt /
SA15bsa0556u:104: tasmāt sattvamātrasya tatra dharmmiṇi sidvasya bādhakavaśādvyāptiḥ setsyatītyeṣitavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:106: te ime vyāptipakṣadharmmatve svasvapramāṇavyavacchedyasādhanavākye na tu kevalaṃ sūcayitavye /
SA15bsa0556u:113: yadi hi dharmmiṇi vyāptiḥ sidhyantyeva sādhyasidvimantarbhāvayati /
SA15bsa0556u:118: na tarhyantarvyāptau hetuvaiyarthyamiti kimakāṇḍakātaratayā bahu taramāyāsamāviśasi /
SA15bsa0556u:119: dvayaṃ hi bhavataḥ sādhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vṛttiḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi ca /
SA15bsa0556u:122: tadvahirbhūte ca dharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ bhavedvaiyarthyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:123: yadā tu vastumātre vivādaḥ tadā sarvvavastuṣu hetorvṛttistvayāpi sādhyā mayāpi ceti katamasmin dharmmiṇi hetorvṛttisādhanaṃ mama vyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA15bsa0556u:126: bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarttamānamantargatamapi dharmmiṇaṃ bahiṣkarotīti cet etadeva kathaṃ bhavatu bādhakena pravarttamānenaiva tasmin sādhyasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0556u:131: sandehānivṛttau na vahiṣkaraṇamavahiṣkṛtaśca sādhyadharmmyeveti tatra vyāptirantarvyāptireva nedānīṃ bahirvyāptervārttāpi /
SA15bsa0556u:132: tadiyaṃbahirvyāptiramusmin pakṣe kathaṃ bhavati yadi pratiniyate dharmmiṇi vivādaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:139: vyāptigrahaḥ kathaṃ nasyāddṛṣṭānte 'pi na vā bhavet //
SA15bsa0556u:140: yatra hi dharmmiṇi dṛṣṭasya hetorvyāptiḥ pratīyate tatra tasya vyāptigrahaṇamākhyāyate /
SA15bsa0556u:141: dṛṣṭañca sādhyadharmmiṇi sattvamanyathā vimatyayogāditi kathaṃ nāntarvyāptiḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:142: tathāpi sādhanavaiyarthyaniṣedhāya bahireva gṛhṇīma iti cet tat kimidānīṃ tvadicchānurodhāt dharmmiṇi hetorddarśanamadarśanamastu /
SA15bsa0556u:144: ubhayatra dṛṣṭasya vyāptigrahaṇe 'pyasti bahirvyāptibhāga iti cet /
SA15bsa0556u:147: nanu yadi bādhakavṛttimātreṇa vyāptigrahaṇādhikaraṇe dharmmiṇi sādhyasidveḥ sādhanavaiyarthyamantarvyāptau tadetadvahirvyāptāvapi tulyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:148: tasmād vyasanamātraṃ bahirvyāptigrahaṇe viśeṣeṇa sattve hetau kevalaṃ jaḍadhiyāmeva niyamena dṛṣṭāntasāpekṣaḥ sādhanaprayogaḥ paritoṣāya jāyate /
SA15bsa0556u:155: kathamidānīṃ anumeye sattvameva sattvameva sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣe vāsattvameva niścitamiti hetostrairupyamavagantavyam /
SA15bsa0556u:157: sattvāsattve tatra hetoste grāhye yatra tatra vā //"
SA15bsa0556u:158: sādhyadharmmayuktaḥ sarvvaḥ sāmānyena sapakṣaḥ, atadyuktaścāsapakṣa iti /
SA15bsa0556u:159: tasmin sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣe cāsattvameva yathākramamanvayavyatirekau tau punaryatra tatra vā dharmmiṇi grahītavyau yatra śakyau grahītum /
SA15bsa0556u:160: tadiha sattvasya sarvvato 'kṣaṇikādvyāvṛttau bādhakabalāt sidvāyāṃ yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti anvayaḥ sādhyadharmmiṇyavagṛhyate /
SA15bsa0556u:174: tataḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyāḥ vyāpteḥ sambhavāt sattvādivadadṛṣṭameva sādhanaṃ śrāvaṇatvākhyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:179: sādhya dharmmiṇi vyāptipratītāveva sādhyapratīteḥ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ syādeva /
SA15bsa0556u:185: samānañcaitadvahirvyāptivādināmapi yadi hi mūḍhamatāpekṣā na syāt syādeva śrāvaṇatvamaduṣṭo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:187: dṛṣṭāntaḥ sarvvaśabdeṣu vigatau bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarttammanaṃ adṛṣṭāntamapi tatraikaṃ dṛṣṭāntayatīti kathama sādhāraṇamanaikāntikaṃ veti / 0 /
